title: Bug 7785 - SaveAs Forgets the file type
description: Bug 7785 - SaveAs Forgets the file type. The icon has also changed from the parent Javafile icon to a generic file icon.
OB:
1) Open an existing Java file
2) Modify the file (e.g., move an existing class)
3) Click the SaveAs icon, located next to the Save Icon
   A dialog box will appear.
4) Browse for a valid container location
5) Type the filename, but ignore the file extension, as it is not requested
6) Click OK

Observed Behavior:
   The file is added to the specified location in the Navigator, but no file extension is shown.
EB: The file should be added to the specified location in the Navigator with the correct file extension.
